modName: Start Game With Iron Pickaxe in Inventory
modShortDescription: Sets parameters in entityclasses.xml to add iron pickaxe to starting equipment in all versions.
modDescription:
Sets parameters in entityclasses.xml to add iron pickaxe to [starting](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-starting-items/) equipment in all versions.

**[Download](https://github.com/pahbi/7DTD_Modlets/raw/main/startPickaxe.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26048-a20-modlets-lotl-perk-fast-plant-growth-super-iron-pickaxe/).

**Credits:** [Pahbi](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/pahbi/)
